title: corrupted rune book
body: It is really frustrating I cant change any runes can a RIOT emplyee reset it or something my user name is ju05ju. please HELP!

replies.body: We can help!  There's an issue right now where re-arranging rune pages or using special characters in the name can cause an issue like that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look into fixing this manually for you.  See you there!
I have also had this issue and have also submitted a support ticket!!! It seems like lots of players are experiencing this!!
I opened a ticket but sadly no response for about 10 hours so far
